logentry.author: gregor
logentry.msg: Allow to set the relation of a new document to an existing one, thanks to a patch by Doug Chestnut. This resolves http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=35130

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: create-document usecase: checking selected relation in JX template, validate relation in exec conditions, set initial relation 'child'

logentry.author: gregor
logentry.msg: Added fallbacks to enable publication templating where necessary. Patch by Doug Chestnut, this resolves http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=35168

logentry.author: gregor
logentry.msg: Added polices to sources to copy for publication instanciator, patch by Doug Chestnut. This resolves http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=35167

logentry.author: gregor
logentry.msg: Use fallback source to resolve sample content location. This enables the create usecase to work in publications that use publication templating. Patch by Doug Chestnut. This resolves http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=35132

logentry.author: jwkaltz
logentry.msg: [minor change] set missing svn:eol-style and svn:keywords properties in Java files

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: (1) added fallback for doctypes, this means doctypes can be served by the core (1st step towards resource type packages) (2) store workflow state and variable values in meta data. currently the history is stored there as well, this is subject to changes.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Delete temp cocoon.xconf patch file on exit. This avoids that the build cancels under Windows when a file locking error occurs. The temp file won't be deleted in this case, so there's still room for improvement. Bug: http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=35394, Patch supplied by Jan Metzner. Thanks!
